en.welcome: Welcome to the Carbon Literacy Game
en.intro_text: Join the fight against climate change by understanding how your actions affect the environment. Become a leader in sustainability!
en.carbon_literacy_description: Carbon literacy is the awareness and knowledge required to understand how our actions impact the environment, particularly in terms of carbon emissions...
en.why_focus_on_carbon_literacy: Why Focus on Carbon Literacy in Nigeria?
en.why_focus_description: Nigeria, as the most populous country in Africa, faces unique challenges and opportunities in addressing climate change...
en.climate_change_description: Educating citizens about the connection between everyday activities and climate change.
en.cultural_relevance_description: Addressing localized issues like deforestation, waste management, and energy consumption.
en.economic_benefits_description: Empowering individuals to adopt eco-friendly practices that save money and improve health.
en.global_responsibility_description: Supporting Nigeria's commitment to the Paris Agreement and global sustainability goals.
en.game_description: This game is designed to make learning about carbon literacy engaging, accessible, and impactful...
en.localized_content_description: Challenges tailored to Nigeria’s realities urban cities to rural areas.
en.language_support_description: Translations in English, Yoruba, Igbo, and Hausa ensure accessibility.
en.interactive_learning_description: Progress through levels and earn rewards as you learn about sustainable practices.
en.action_oriented_description: Take real actions that contribute to reducing your carbon footprint.
en.your_role: Your Role in Building a Sustainable Nigeria
en.your_role_description: As you navigate through this game, you will explore how your choices, from the food you eat to the energy you consume, impact the environment.
en.green_future_message: Let’s tackle climate change together. Your journey towards a greener future begins here.
en.start_journey: Start Your Carbon Literacy Journey Now!
en.call_to_action: Join the movement and become a catalyst for change. Learn, play, and make a real-world difference!

ig.intro_text: Sonye na ọgụ megide mgbanwe ihu igwe site n'ịghọta otú omume gị si emetụta gburugburu ebe obibi. Ghọọ onye ndu na ịdịgide ndụ!
ig.carbon_literacy_description: Carbon literacy bụ nghọta na ihe ọmụma a chọrọ iji ghọta otú omume anyị si emetụta gburugburu ebe obibi, karịsịa na echiche nke ịtụfu carbon...
ig.why_focus_on_carbon_literacy: Gịnị mere anyị ga-eji lekwasị anya na Carbon Literacy na Naijiria?
ig.why_focus_description: Naijiria, dịka obodo nwere ọtụtụ ndị bi na ya na Africa, nwere nsogbu na ohere pụrụ iche n'ịkụziri mgbanwe ihu igwe...
ig.climate_change_description: Ịkụziri ndị mmadụ banyere njikọ dị n'etiti omume kwa ụbọchị na mgbanwe ihu igwe.
ig.cultural_relevance: Mmetụta Omenala na Ụfọdụ Ndị Ọma
ig.cultural_relevance_description: Ihie ihe ndị metụtara mpaghara dịka ịkpochapụ ọhịa, njikwa ahịhịa, na iji ike.
ig.economic_benefits: Uru Ọrụ akụ na ụba na Mmekọrịta
ig.economic_benefits_description: Inye ndị mmadụ ikike iji nweta omume ọma gburugburu ebe obibi nke ga-enyere ha belata ego ma melite ahụike.
ig.global_responsibility_description: Inyere Naijiria aka imezu nkwekọrịta Paris na ebumnuche ịdịgide ndụ nke ụwa.
ig.how_game_helps: Olee otú Egwuregwu a si enyere
ig.game_description: Egwuregwu a e mere ka ịmụta banyere carbon literacy bụrụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ, nke a pụrụ ịnweta, ma bụrụkwa nke na-emetụta ndụ.
ig.localized_content_description: Ị challenges kwadoro maka eziokwu Naijiria, site na obodo ruo na ime obodo.
ig.language_support_description: Ndị asụsụ dị na Bekee, Yoruba, Igbo na Hausa na-enye ohere ịnweta.
ig.interactive_learning_description: Nọrọ n'azụ site na ọkwa ma nweta ụgwọ ọrụ ka ị na-amụta banyere omume na-adịgide adịgide.
ig.action_oriented_description: Gbaa ọsọ nke omume ndị na-enyere aka belata ụfụfu carbon gị.
ig.your_role: Ọrụ gị n’ịmepụta Naijiria n’ime obodo
ig.your_role_description: Ka ị na-aga n’egwuregwu a, ị ga-enwe mmasị na ịhụ ụzọ ndụ gị, site n’iri nri gị ruo n’iji ike, na-emetụta gburugburu.
ig.green_future_message: Ka anyị na-eme atụmatụ iji mee mgbanwe ihu igwe. Igodo nke ndụ adịgide adịgide gị malitere ebe a.
ig.start_journey: Bido Ịmụ Carbon Literacy ugbu a!
ig.call_to_action: Bido na gburugburu ọnụ ọgụgụ na ụzọ nke mgbanwe. Mụta, gbaa egwuregwu, bụrụ mgbanwe n'ezie n'ụwa!

ha.intro_text: Shiga yaki da canjin yanayi ta hanyar fahimtar yadda ayyukan ka ke shafar muhalli. Zama jagora a cikin dorewar muhalli!
ha.carbon_literacy_description: Carbon literacy ilimi ne da kuma fahimtar da ake bukata don fahimtar yadda ayyukanmu ke shafar muhalli, musamman ma wajen fitar da carbon...
ha.why_focus_on_carbon_literacy: Me yasa ya kamata mu mayar da hankali kan Carbon Literacy a Najeriya?
ha.why_focus_description: Najeriya, matsayin kasa mafi yawan al'umma a Afirka, tana fuskantar kalubale da dama wajen magance canjin yanayi...
ha.climate_change_description: Koyar da 'yan kasa game da dangantaka tsakanin ayyukan yau da kullum da canjin yanayi.
ha.cultural_relevance_description: Magance matsalolin da suka shafi yankin kamar sare dazuzzuka, kula da shara, da amfani da makamashi.
ha.economic_benefits_description: Ba wa mutane damar amfani da hanyoyin muhalli masu kyau waɗanda zasu ceci kuɗi da inganta lafiya.
ha.global_responsibility_description: Tallafa wa Najeriya a cikin yarjejeniyar Paris da manufofin dorewar duniya.
ha.game_description: Wannan wasan an tsara shi ne don yin koyo game da carbon literacy mai ban sha'awa, mai sauƙi da kuma tasiri.
ha.localized_content_description: Kwarewar da aka tsara ta musamman don yanayi na Najeriya, daga birane zuwa yankunan karkara.
ha.language_support_description: Fassara cikin Ingilishi, Yoruba, Igbo, da Hausa yana tabbatar da samun dama.
ha.interactive_learning_description: Ci gaba da matakai kuma sami lada yayin da kake koyon dabaru masu dorewa.
ha.action_oriented_education: Ilmi Mai Mayar da hankali kan Ayyuka
ha.action_oriented_description: Yi ainihin ayyuka da ke taimakawa wajen rage fitar da carbon.
ha.your_role: Rawar da zaka taka wajen Gina Najeriya Mai Dorewa
ha.your_role_description: Yayin da kake tafiya a cikin wannan wasan, za ka gano yadda zabin ka, daga abincin da kake ci zuwa makamashi da kake amfani da shi, ke shafar muhalli.
ha.green_future_message: Mu tunkari canjin yanayi tare. Tafiyarka zuwa gaba mai kore tana farawa anan.
ha.start_journey: Fara Tafiyarka na Carbon Literacy Yanzu!
ha.call_to_action: Shiga cikin wannan motsi ka zama mai canji. Koyi, yi wasa, kuma ka kawo bambanci a duniya!
ha.play_game_button: Yi Wasa da Carbon Literacy Game

yo.intro_text: Darapọ mọ ija lodi si iyipada oju-ọjọ nipa imọ bi awọn iṣe rẹ ṣe ni ipa ayika. Di olori ni ilolupo!
yo.carbon_literacy_description: Imọ-ọrọ erogba ni imọ ati alaye ti o nilo lati loye bi awọn iṣe wa ṣe ni ipa ayika, ni pataki ni awọn ofin ti idasilẹ erogba...
yo.why_focus_on_carbon_literacy: Kilode ti a fi yẹ ki a fojusi Imọ-ọrọ Erogba ni Naijiria?
yo.why_focus_description: Naijiria, gẹgẹbi orilẹ-ede ti o ni awọn olugbe julọ ni Afirika, ni awọn italaya ati awọn anfani alailẹgbẹ ni ipade iyipada oju-ọjọ...
yo.climate_change_description: Kọ awọn ara ilu nipa asopọ laarin awọn iṣẹ ojoojumọ ati iyipada oju-ọjọ.
yo.cultural_relevance_description: Iṣoro agbegbe bii igbo, iṣakoso idoti, ati lilo agbara.
yo.economic_benefits_description: Fi agbara han awọn eniyan lati gba awọn ọna ṣiṣe ayika ti o jẹ ki wọn fi owo pamọ ati mu ilera dara.
yo.global_responsibility_description: Ṣe atilẹyin fun ifaramọ Naijiria si Adehun Paris ati awọn ibi-afẹde ilolupo kariaye.
yo.how_game_helps: Bawo ni Ere yii ṣe Nran
yo.game_description: Ere yii jẹ apẹrẹ lati jẹ ki ẹkọ nipa imọ-ọrọ erogba jẹ alawọ ati irọrun...
yo.localized_content_description: Awọn ipenija ti a ṣe amọja si awọn otito Naijiria, lati awọn ilu ilu si awọn agbegbe igberiko.
yo.language_support_description: Awọn itumọ ni Gẹẹsi, Yoruba, Igbo, ati Hausa ṣe idaniloju iraye si fun gbogbo eniyan.
yo.interactive_learning_description: Lọsiwaju nipasẹ awọn ipele ati gba awọn ẹbun bi o ṣe n kọ ẹkọ nipa awọn ilana ilolupo.
yo.action_oriented_education: Ẹkọ ti o da lori Iṣe
yo.action_oriented_description: Gba awọn igbese gidi ti o ṣe iranlọwọ lati dinku ipa erogba rẹ.
yo.your_role: Ipa rẹ ni kikọ Naijiria ti o ni ilolupo
yo.your_role_description: Bi o ṣe n lọ kiri ninu ere yii, iwọ yoo ṣawari bi awọn ipinnu rẹ, lati ounjẹ ti o jẹ si agbara ti o nlo, ṣe ni ipa lori ayika.
yo.green_future_message: Jẹ ki a koju iyipada oju-ọjọ papọ. Irin-ajo rẹ si ọjọ iwaju ti o mọ ni ibi bẹrẹ nibi.
yo.start_journey: Bẹrẹ Irin-ajo Imọ-ọrọ Erogba rẹ Bayi!
yo.call_to_action: Darapọ mọ irekọja naa ki o di alakoso fun iyipada. Kọ ẹkọ, ṣere, ki o ṣe iyatọ gidi ni agbaye!
